EmailTemplate.name: Digital Banking Drip Campaign.06 - Send Email 6.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Live Webinar: Providing Powerful Digital Solutions When They're Needed Most
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://ncrevent.webex.com/mw3300/mywebex/default.do?nomenu=true&siteurl=ncrevent&service=6&rnd=0.5837164398039255&main_url=https%3A%2F%2Fncrevent.webex.com%2Fec3300%2Feventcenter%2Fevent%2FeventAction.do%3FtheAction%3Ddetail%26%26%26EMK%3D4832534b00000004138c67e94d6a8af6a77190069926876158f7250cc9b3eab7b737672a013cdc8a%26siteurl%3Dncrevent%26confViewID%3D161323712190090491%26encryptTicket%3DSDJTSwAAAAQAZdtuxOai2W9AVce9M2mxXVbuLgVUzOZs6k4U5M0CsQ2%26]]>In times of uncertainty, your customers and members depend on you more than ever. Reach them when they need you most through key digital banking capabilities that enable them to access important information, stay up to date on key products and services, and safely manage their financial lives. Be their safety net in these uncertain times, how and when they need you – all from the convenience of digital banking.
In this special one-hour webinar, you’ll learn how to maximize the impact of your digital channel with communication features that keep you connected to your users:
- Message of the Day and Login Message - Right-time, right-place targeted marketing - Mobile login notifications - Best-practice solutions including live chat and secure email
Join us on June 10th to see how a powerful digital solution can help you deliver experiences that make a difference – anywhere and at any hour.
Can’t join the webinar live? We’ve got you covered. Access the recording after the event when it’s convenient for you or register below today to receive the recording in your inbox. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Digital Banking Webinar Provide Powerful Digital Solutions When They’re Needed Most Wednesday, June 10, 2020 10 a.m. PT / 1 p.m. ET
